alfredsnippet.snippet:
# ref: https://www.tutorialspoint.com/svn/svn_quick_guide.htm

svn checkout http://svn.server.com/svn/project_repo --username=tom
# this will copy remove dir into local dir.

# make some change in workdir.
svn add filename  # add new file
# do codereview there !

svn status  # check status
svn diff  # check diff

svn commit -m "message"  # commit to REMOTE server.
alfredsnippet.name: svn gist
